item.title: All Escape from Tarkov Codes—Active Reward Codes and Free Items
item.content:encoded:
Escape from Tarkov is the most popular extraction shooter in the world, boasting hundreds of thousands of active players. It’s a game centered around loot, and sometimes, you might need help securing that loot. That’s where Battlestate Games comes in, regularly publishing Escape from Tarkov codes that you can use to get free items.

Below, I’ve collated all the active Escape from Tarkov codes that you can redeem right now, either in the launcher or via the website. Read on to pick up the free items in Tarkov that you know you want.

All Active Escape from Tarkov Codes

Battlestate Games has a habit of publishing Escape from Tarkov codes that expire quite quickly, with some only being available for 24 hours. With that in mind, I’ve written the most recent Tarkov codes that are working, and the ones that might work and are still worth a try.

Active Escape from Tarkov Codes

  • SERVERMAN
  • SMELLOFNAPALM
  • LETMEIN
  • GIMMEWIRES

Escape from Tarkov Codes That Might Have Expired

  • WILWILBE
  • SCAVYBOI
  • ITSADRILL

How to Redeem Escape from Tarkov Codes

When you open the Battlestate Games launcher, you can simply click on the top right-hand menu, where your username and online status indicator are, and click ‘Activate Code’:

This is by far the easiest way to redeem free Escape from Tarkov codes.

How to Find More Tarkov Codes

If you want more Escape from Tarkov codes, I’d recommend bookmarking this page and coming back every now and then. Otherwise, you can follow Nikita Buyanov on social media, as he’s the head of the studio at Battlestate Games and almost always is the one posting these codes.

Here’s his profile:

  • Nikita’s X Profile

Alternatively, you can join the official Escape from Tarkov Discord server to wait for drops.

Let us know on the Insider Gaming Discord server if you’ve found any more codes lurking around.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Tarkov’s Terminal map has finally been entered
